name: Star Boy (itch) (campotech)
description:
An evil weapon known as the Black Star is invading the galaxy. Only you as Mark Mcklowski leader of the Star Boy team can destroy it.

As leader of the Star Boy team you must fly and fight enemy invaders through 5 levels of hard and difficult battlefields and fight your way through enemy lines to reach the Black Star and destroy it to save the galaxy

X-Station Controller

D-Pad = Move ship

X Button = Shoot lasers

B Button = Shoot missiles

LB and RB = Shift left or right

RT = Reset the game

LT = End the game
